name: help
brief: Configure package.json scripts, and give a short breif for each one.

name: update-modules
brief: Update all modules to latest version.

name: install-module
brief: Install specific carmel module that you are missing.

name: import-mongo
brief:
Import mongo-db from carmeldev server. Specify db name, and if to merge or not-
In case you use the merge, the new data WILL NOT override your existing data. 
If you won't set it, conflicts will receive incomming data. 

Example: npm run import-mongo mydatabase merge

name: export-mongo
brief: Export your mongo-db to carmeldev dumps. \nExample: npm run export-mongo mydatabase

name: generate-config
brief: Add config entrys for repositories in config.json and config.production.json.
